wikipedia_page.main: James Potter (born 20 November 1941) is a Northern Irish former footballer who played as a wing half in the Football League for Darlington. He began his career as a youngster with Sunderland, without playing first-team football for the club, and after leaving Darlington he returned to his native Northern Ireland to join Linfield.

response: * Jimmy Potter (born 1941), Northern Irish former footballer
